response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This price not only reflects the high quality and functionality of the product but also allows for a reasonable profit margin for us. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both parties.", "product_price": 9500}
